text: “Mosesɨn kamra Israelba an aghuagha ghaze, ‘Tina nɨ amɨsevezɨ nɨ en gumazir dapanim ko jasɨn ikiava en gari?’ Ezɨ kar anarɨra, gumazir God uabɨ men gumazir dapanimɨn ikɨ egh ua me iniasava amadazim. E fo, God Moses bagha enselɨn mam amadazɨ ensel temer isim aven otozɨ Moses an gara God amadazir akam ini.
